mapper.sql: id , name, keyword, description, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select p.keyword keyword from sys_user as u left join sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.sys_user_id left join sys_role as r on r.id = ur.sys_role_id left join sys_role_permission as rp on r.id = rp.sys_role_id left join sys_permission as p on p.id = rp.sys_permission_id where u.id = #{sysUserId} and u.is_delete = 0 and r.is_delete = 0 and p.is_delete = 0
